casebody.data:
POOR SUBSTITUTE TRUSTEE, LTD. Substitute Trustee
v.
Guy E. FRANKLIN and Rita Thomas Franklin No. 293P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Rita Franklin, for Franklin, Guy E., et al. D. Kyle Deak, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Poor Substitute Trustee, LTD.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 30th of August 2017 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
